General.Name: Huaihe Energy Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Huaihe Energy (Group) Co.,Ltd engages in logistics and trade business in China. It is also involved in railway transportation, thermal power generation, coal trading, and electricity sales activities. The company was formerly known as Anhui Wanjiang Logistics (Group) Co., Ltd and changed its name to Huaihe Energy (Group) Co.,Ltd in September 2019. Huaihe Energy (Group) Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Wuhu, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jin Hua Ma
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer, Sec. of the Board of Directors and Director
